Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the DUMBO business improvement district.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of the DUMBO business improvement district.

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Resolution concerning the amendment to the Metrotech Area Business Improvement District Plan which provides for a change in the method of assessment upon which the district charge is based, and setting the date, time and place for the hearing of the local law amending the District Plan for the Metrotech Area Business Improvement District.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amendment to the Metrotech Area Business Improvement District Plan.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend the New York Tax Law to give the City of New York the authority to replace its portion of the sales tax on motor fuel and diesel fuel with an excise tax, setting a flat/fixed cents per gallon tax rate.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Amend the NY Tax Law to give NYC the authority to replace its portion of the sales tax on motor fuel and diesel fuel with an excise tax, setting a flat/fixed cents per gallon tax rate.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the imposition of the utility tax and providing a separate rate for such tax for certain cooperative corporations that produce and distribute electricity, steam, refrigeration or water to such cooperative corporation tenants and/or occupants.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the imposition of the utility tax and providing a separate rate for such tax for certain cooperative corporations that produce and distribute electricity, steam, refrigeration or water to such cooperative corporation tenants and/or occupants.
